title: Select Skills and Difficulty Level
expected_result: AWS skill is selected and difficulty level is set to Moderate

title: Configure Standard Questions
expected_result: Standard question is configured with preferred answer

title: Configure Role-Based Questions
expected_result: Role-based question is configured with ideal answer

title: Create Interview
expected_result: Interview is created with unique public link

title: Viewing candidate responses in the responses tab
steps: Navigate to the responses tab
Verify the candidate's video recording is playable
Verify the candidate's structured answers are displayed
Verify the candidate's scores and resume are displayed
expected_result: All candidate responses are displayed correctly

title: Viewing interview scores and summary
steps: Navigate to the interview screenings section
Verify the candidate's interview score is displayed
Verify the candidate's communication score is displayed
Verify the AI's comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: All interview scores and summary are displayed correctly

title: Rejecting or selecting a candidate
steps: Click the action button next to the candidate's response
Verify the option to select or reject the candidate is displayed
Click either the select or reject button
Verify the candidate's status is updated accordingly

title: Screening resumes with AI
steps: Create an interview and upload multiple resumes
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify each resume is assigned a score based on skills and experience
Verify the AI recommends profiles for the next stage based on suitability
expected_result: AI screens resumes correctly and recommends profiles

title: Sending interview link to candidate
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate
Verify the option to send an interview link is displayed
Click the send interview link button
Verify the link is valid for 24 hours
expected_result: Interview link is sent to candidate correctly
